languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт приподнимает подбородок и сразу становится как будто еще выше.{/n} "Слуги {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Той, Что Жаждет{/g} учуяли мою душу за толстыми стенами и за тонкой пеленой, что отгораживает ваши хрупкие жизни от ярости, бушующей за бортом. {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Дитя Азуриана{/g}, проникшая за пелену... на расстоянии вытянутой лапы... за слабым барьером из ненадежной технологии мон-кай... Это слишком соблазнительная добыча для чудовищ, служащих Сай'лантреш".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ирлиэт приподнимает подбородок и сразу становится как будто еще выше.{/n} "Слуги {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Той, Что Жаждет{/g} учуяли мою душу за толстыми стенами и за тонкой пеленой, что отгораживает ваши хрупкие жизни от ярости, бушующей за бортом. {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Дитя Азуриана{/g}, проникшая за пелену... на расстоянии вытянутой лапы... за слабым барьером из ненадежной технологии мон-кай... Это слишком соблазнительная добыча для чудовищ, служащих Сай'лантреш".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet juts out her chin and somehow seems even taller than she actually is.{/n} "The minions of {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g} could sense my soul behind the thick walls and thin veil that separate your fragile lives from the roiling fury outside. A {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g} that dared to wander beyond the veil... within the reach of an outstretched claw... protected only by the barrier of unreliable mon-keigh technology... It is too tempting a quarry for the monsters that serve Sai'lanthresh."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт приподнимает подбородок и сразу становится как будто еще выше.{/n} "Слуги {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Той, Что Жаждет{/g} учуяли мою душу за толстыми стенами и за тонкой пеленой, что отгораживает ваши хрупкие жизни от ярости, бушующей за бортом. {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Дитя Азуриана{/g}, проникшая за пелену... на расстоянии вытянутой лапы... за слабым барьером из ненадежной технологии мон-кай... Это слишком соблазнительная добыча для чудовищ, служащих Сай'лантреш".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet sticks out her chin and somehow appears to be even taller than she actually is.{/n} "The minions of She Who Thirsts could sense my soul behind the thick walls and thin veil that are separating your fragile lives from the roiling fury outside. A Child of Asuryan that dared to wander beyond the veil... Within paw's reach... Protected only by the barrier of unreliable mon-keigh technology... It is too tempting a prey for the monsters that serve Sai'lanthresh."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特扬起了下巴，看起来似乎比实际的样子更加高挑。{/n}“亚空间厚重的高墙与薄薄的面纱，可以保护你们脆弱的生命，让你们免遭咆哮的风暴侵袭。但{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}饥渴女士{/g}的爪牙却可以穿过这些障碍，感觉到我的灵魂。{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}竟敢穿过那道面纱……闯进邪恶利爪的范围之内……保护她的只有猴子那不太可靠的屏障……对侍奉赛·兰斯雷什的怪物而言，这样的猎物实在是过于诱人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet juts out her chin and somehow seems even taller than she actually is.{/n} "The minions of {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g} could sense my soul behind the thick walls and thin veil that separate your fragile lives from the roiling fury outside. A {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g} that dared to wander beyond the veil... within the reach of an outstretched claw... protected only by the barrier of unreliable mon-keigh technology... It is too tempting a quarry for the monsters that serve Sai'lanthresh."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特扬起了下巴，看起来似乎比实际的样子更加高挑。{/n}“亚空间厚重的高墙与薄薄的面纱，可以保护你们脆弱的生命，让你们免遭咆哮的风暴侵袭。但{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}饥渴女士{/g}的爪牙却可以穿过这些障碍，感觉到我的灵魂。{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}竟敢穿过那道面纱……闯进邪恶利爪的范围之内……保护她的只有猴子那不太可靠的屏障……对侍奉赛·兰斯雷什的怪物而言，这样的猎物实在是过于诱人。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet juts out her chin and somehow seems even taller than she actually is.{/n} "The minions of She Who Thirsts could sense my soul behind the thick walls and thin veil that separate your fragile lives from the roiling fury outside. A Child of Asuryan that dared to wander beyond the veil... within the reach of an outstretched claw... protected only by the barrier of unreliable mon-keigh technology... It is too tempting a quarry for the monsters that serve Sai'lanthresh."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet alza la barbilla y aparenta ser aún más alta de lo que ya es.{/n} «Los esbirros de {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}la Sedienta{/g} podían sentir mi alma tras los gruesos muros y el delgado velo que separa vuestras frágiles vidas de la furia agitada del otro lado. Una {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hija de Asuryan{/g} que osa aventurarse más allá del velo... al alcance de una garra extendida... protegida solo por la barrera de la dudosa tecnología mon-keigh... Es una tentación demasiado poderosa para los monstruos que sirven a Sai'lanthresh».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet juts out her chin and somehow seems even taller than she actually is.{/n} "The minions of {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g} could sense my soul behind the thick walls and thin veil that separate your fragile lives from the roiling fury outside. A {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g} that dared to wander beyond the veil... within the reach of an outstretched claw... protected only by the barrier of unreliable mon-keigh technology... It is too tempting a quarry for the monsters that serve Sai'lanthresh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet alza la barbilla y aparenta ser aún más alta de lo que ya es.{/n} «Los esbirros de {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}la Sedienta{/g} podían sentir mi alma tras los gruesos muros y el delgado velo que separa vuestras frágiles vidas de la furia agitada del otro lado. Una {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hija de Asuryan{/g} que osa aventurarse más allá del velo... al alcance de una garra extendida... protegida solo por la barrera de la dudosa tecnología mon-keigh... Es una tentación demasiado poderosa para los monstruos que sirven a Sai'lanthresh».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは顎を突き出す。その動きはなぜか、彼女の背丈を実際よりも高く見せた。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}かの渇きたる女{/g}のしもべたちは、厚い壁と薄いヴェールの向こうにある我の魂を感じ取った。敢えてヴェールの向こう側をさまよう{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子ら{/g}…延ばした鉤爪の届く範囲…信頼性の低いモン＝ケイの技術によるバリアによってのみ守られている…それはセランスレッシュに仕える怪物にとって、あまりにも魅力的な獲物だった」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet juts out her chin and somehow seems even taller than she actually is.{/n} "The minions of {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g} could sense my soul behind the thick walls and thin veil that separate your fragile lives from the roiling fury outside. A {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g} that dared to wander beyond the veil... within the reach of an outstretched claw... protected only by the barrier of unreliable mon-keigh technology... It is too tempting a quarry for the monsters that serve Sai'lanthresh."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは顎を突き出す。その動きはなぜか、彼女の背丈を実際よりも高く見せた。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}かの渇きたる女{/g}のしもべたちは、厚い壁と薄いヴェールの向こうにある我の魂を感じ取った。敢えてヴェールの向こう側をさまよう{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子ら{/g}…延ばした鉤爪の届く範囲…信頼性の低いモン＝ケイの技術によるバリアによってのみ守られている…それはセランスレッシュに仕える怪物にとって、あまりにも魅力的な獲物だった」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet reckt Ihr Kinn und wirkt plötzlich noch größer, als sie es ohnehin schon ist.{/n} "Die Schergen von {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Ihr, die dürstet{/g}, konnten meine Seele hinter den dicken Wänden und dem dünnen Schleier spüren, der Eure zerbrechlichen Leben von dem brodelnden Zorn draußen trennt. Ein {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kind von Asuryan{/g}, das es wagte, durch den Schleier zu treten ... in Reichweite einer ausgestreckten Klaue ... beschützt nur durch die Barriere unzuverlässiger Chem-Pan-Sey-Technologie ... Eine zu verlockende Beute für die Monster, die Sai'lanthresh dienen."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet juts out her chin and somehow seems even taller than she actually is.{/n} "The minions of {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g} could sense my soul behind the thick walls and thin veil that separate your fragile lives from the roiling fury outside. A {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g} that dared to wander beyond the veil... within the reach of an outstretched claw... protected only by the barrier of unreliable mon-keigh technology... It is too tempting a quarry for the monsters that serve Sai'lanthresh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet reckt Ihr Kinn und wirkt plötzlich noch größer, als sie es ohnehin schon ist.{/n} "Die Schergen von {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Ihr, die dürstet{/g}, konnten meine Seele hinter den dicken Wänden und dem dünnen Schleier spüren, der Eure zerbrechlichen Leben von dem brodelnden Zorn draußen trennt. Ein {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kind von Asuryan{/g}, das es wagte, durch den Schleier zu treten ... in Reichweite einer ausgestreckten Klaue ... beschützt nur durch die Barriere unzuverlässiger Chem-Pan-Sey-Technologie ... Eine zu verlockende Beute für die Monster, die Sai'lanthresh dienen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet lève le menton, ce qui la fait paraître encore plus grande.{/n} « Les sbires de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Assoiffée{/g} pouvaient sentir mon âme à travers les parois épaisses et le voile ténu qui séparaient vos vies fragiles de la tourmente du Warp. Une {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfant d'Asuryan{/g} qui a osé s'aventurer au-delà du voile... à la portée d'une griffe tendue... protégée uniquement par une technologie mon-keigh rudimentaire... Je faisais une proie trop tentante pour les monstres au service de Sai'lanthresh. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet juts out her chin and somehow seems even taller than she actually is.{/n} "The minions of {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g} could sense my soul behind the thick walls and thin veil that separate your fragile lives from the roiling fury outside. A {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g} that dared to wander beyond the veil... within the reach of an outstretched claw... protected only by the barrier of unreliable mon-keigh technology... It is too tempting a quarry for the monsters that serve Sai'lanthresh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet lève le menton, ce qui la fait paraître encore plus grande.{/n} « Les sbires de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Assoiffée{/g} pouvaient sentir mon âme à travers les parois épaisses et le voile ténu qui séparaient vos vies fragiles de la tourmente du Warp. Une {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfant d'Asuryan{/g} qui a osé s'aventurer au-delà du voile... à la portée d'une griffe tendue... protégée uniquement par une technologie mon-keigh rudimentaire... Je faisais une proie trop tentante pour les monstres au service de Sai'lanthresh. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, çenesini öne doğru çıkarıyor. Her nasılsa olduğundan daha uzun görünüyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Susayan'ın{/g} köleleri, kalın duvarların ve narin yaşamlarınızı dış dünyanın çalkalandığı öfkeden ayıran o ince örtünün ardından bile ruhumu hissedebilir. Örtünün ötesine geçmeye cüret eden bir {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocuğu{/g}... Uzanan bir pençenin neredeyse avucunun içinde... Güven vermeyen mon-keigh teknolojisinden bir bariyerle korunuyor... Sai'lanthresh'e hizmet eden canavarların gözünde fazlasıyla cazip bir av bu."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet juts out her chin and somehow seems even taller than she actually is.{/n} "The minions of {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g} could sense my soul behind the thick walls and thin veil that separate your fragile lives from the roiling fury outside. A {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g} that dared to wander beyond the veil... within the reach of an outstretched claw... protected only by the barrier of unreliable mon-keigh technology... It is too tempting a quarry for the monsters that serve Sai'lanthresh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, çenesini öne doğru çıkarıyor. Her nasılsa olduğundan daha uzun görünüyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Susayan{/g}'ın köleleri, kalın duvarların ve narin yaşamlarınızı dış dünyanın çalkalandığı öfkeden ayıran o ince örtünün ardından bile ruhumu hissedebilirler. Örtünün ötesine geçmeye cüret eden bir {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocuğu{/g}... Uzanan bir pençenin neredeyse avucunun içinde... Güven vermeyen mon-keigh teknolojisinden bir bariyerle korunuyor... Sai'lanthresh'e hizmet eden canavarların gözünde fazlasıyla cazip bir av bu."
